trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for a Web server control <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Web 伺服器控制項的基底類別<xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: WebControlToolboxItem provides a base class for toolbox items that create Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: WebControlToolboxItem 提供工具箱項目所建立的 Web 伺服器控制項的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: This class extends <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> and provides the following additional methods: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolAttributeValue%2A> gets the value of an attribute of the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會擴充<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>，並提供下列額外的方法:-<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolAttributeValue%2A>取得的工具箱項目屬性的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolAttributeValue%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolHtml%2A> gets the HTML that represents the initial state of the control.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolHtml%2A>取得表示控制項的初始狀態的 HTML。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolType%2A> gets the type of the associated runtime component.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolType%2A>取得相關聯的執行階段元件的類型。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A> is set to a short version of the type name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A>設為類型名稱的簡短版本。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref> class using the provided type.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref>類別使用提供的類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A> is set to a short version of the type name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A>設為類型名稱的簡短版本。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the tool for this toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的這個工具箱項目的工具。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref> class using the provided <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref>類別使用提供<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>物件和<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: A SerializationInfo object containing information needed to instantiate the Web control through deserialization.
trans-unit.target: SerializationInfo 物件，其中包含具現化的 Web 控制項，透過還原序列化所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: A StreamingContext object.
trans-unit.target: StreamingContext 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates objects from each type contained in this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>, and adds them to the specified designer.
trans-unit.target: 在此所包含的每個型別從建立物件<xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>，並將它們加入至指定的設計工具。

trans-unit.source: CreateComponentsCore always throws an exception, indicating that the method is inherited from <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> and only intended for use with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: CreateComponentsCore 一律會擲回例外狀況，表示方法繼承自<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>和只適用於搭配 Windows Form。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the current design document.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref>目前的設計文件。

trans-unit.source: An array of created <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 陣列建立<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The CreateComponentsCore method is only available in Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 只在 Windows Form 中使用 CreateComponentsCore 方法。

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the toolbox item from the specified serialization information object.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的序列化資訊物件載入工具箱項目的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that describes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>描述<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that indicates the serialization stream characteristics.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>指出的序列化資料流特性。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified type of attribute of the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定類型的工具箱項目屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if the `attributeType` parameter is anything other than a <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果`attributeType`參數不是<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>.</xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute> </xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the current design document.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref>目前的設計文件。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to retrieve the value of.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的值的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified type of attribute.
trans-unit.target: 指定類型的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The attributeType parameter is not a .
trans-unit.target: The attributeType parameter is not a .

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML for the Web control that the tool creates.
trans-unit.target: 取得此工具會建立 Web 控制項的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the current design document.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref>目前的設計文件。

trans-unit.source: The HTML for the Web control that the tool creates.
trans-unit.target: 此工具會建立 Web 控制項的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 取得此工具箱項目類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the current design document.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref>目前的設計文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of this toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>這個工具箱項目。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes this toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 初始化這個工具箱項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the Web server control toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的 Web 伺服器控制項的工具箱項目。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the toolbox item to the specified serialization information object.
trans-unit.target: 將工具箱項目的狀態儲存至指定的序列化資訊物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> used to save the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>用來儲存的狀態<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that indicates the serialization stream characteristics.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>指出的序列化資料流特性。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
